info.title: Commons Votes API
info.description: An API that allows querying of Commons Votes data.

get.description: Single Division which has the specified Id

parameters.name: divisionId
parameters.description: Id number of a Division whose records are to be returned

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: xml or json

get.summary: Return Divisions results grouped by party
get.description: Division results which meet the specified criteria grouped by parties

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: xml or json

parameters.name: queryParameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberId
parameters.description: Divisions returning Member with Member ID voting records

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.endDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.divisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

get.summary: Return voting records for a Member
get.description: List of voting records for a member which meet the specified criteria.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: xml or json

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberId
parameters.description: Id number of a Member whose voting records are to be returned

parameters.name: queryParameters.skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip. Default is 0

parameters.name: queryParameters.take
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. Default is 25

parameters.name: queryParameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.endDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.divisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

get.description: List of Divisions which meet the specified criteria

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: json or xml

parameters.name: queryParameters.skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip. Default is 0

parameters.name: queryParameters.take
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. Default is 25

parameters.name: queryParameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberId
parameters.description: Divisions returning Member with Member ID voting records

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.endDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.divisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

get.description: Total count of Divisions meeting the specified criteria

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: json or xml

parameters.name: queryParameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberId
parameters.description: Divisions returning Member with Member ID voting records

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeWhenMemberWasTeller
parameters.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.endDate
parameters.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: queryParameters.divisionNumber
parameters.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

Ayes.description: Counts of all members who voted 'Aye', grouped by party

Noes.description: Counts of all members who voted 'Noe', grouped by party

DivisionNumber.description: Division Number - as specified by the House, unique within a session. This is different to the division id which uniquely identifies a division in this system and is passed to the GET division endpoint

EndDate.description: Divisions where division date in one or before date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

IncludeWhenMemberWasTeller.description: Divisions where member was a teller as well as if they actually voted

MemberId.description: Id number of a Member whose voting records are to be returned

SearchTerm.description: Divisions containing search term within title or number

Skip.description: The number of records to skip. Default is 0

StartDate.description: Divisions where division date in one or after date provided. Date format is yyyy-MM-dd

Take.description: The number of records to return per page. Default is 25
